```{r}
#FUNCTION: zero_counter
#purpose:to count the zeros in a vector
#input:a vector
#output:
#------------------------------
zero_counter <- function(counter=0) {
v<-round(runif(min=0, max=5, n=30))
counter=0
for(i in seq_along(v)){
if(v[i]== 0){counter<-counter+1}}

  return(counter) }
print(counter)

print(v)
```

```{r}
#FUNCTION: remix_yall
# purpose:
# input:
# output:
#------------------------------
remix_yall <- function(data)  {
  shuffle_data<- transform(data,values=sample(values))
 print(shuffle_data) 
 means<-tapply(shuffle_data$values,shuffle_data$group,mean)
 
 list<-list(means,shuffle_data)
.<-as.vector(unlist(means,shuffle_data))
return(.)
 
} 
remix_yall(long_df)
is.vector(remix_yall(long_df))
###############################
#FUNCTION: sim_100
# purpose:
# input:
# output:
#------------------------------
sim_100 <- function(data)  {
   s<-(1:100)
  for(i in seq_along(s)){
.<-remix_yall(data)
sim_data<- data.frame(i,.[1], .[2], .[3])
 sim_data[nrow(sim_data) + 1,] = c(i,.[1], .[2], .[3]) }
 return(sim_data)
   }

sim_100(long_df)
```
